gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 117, Pelicans 108
gameRecap.excerpt: Orlando wins their third in a row as they defeat the Pelicans, 117-108. Paolo Banchero was solid with 32 points, six rebounds, and four assists while Franz Wagner (24 points, five assists) and Mo Wagner (18 points) added 42 points. CJ McCollum led the Pels with 36 points (five 3PM), 10 rebounds, and four assists. The Magic move to 45-31 as the Pelicans fall to 45-31.
